project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would include: (1) rehabilitation of veterinary and animal production services in Ituri; (2) improvement of marketing services, a stockroute and rural slaughter facilities; (3) rehabilitation of buildings at a research station to serve as a training center to train Project staff and farmers; (4) development of three existing ranches to fatten cattle and improve local breeding stock; and (5) improvement of existing abattoirs at Bunia and Kisangani; and (6) execution of studies related to the livestock sector and studies necessary for the preparation of further projects in the Project area.
